__COMMENT: Network topology description used by network application and Mininet script
switches: each switch is a dictionary of adjacent switch name: local port switch
dpids: mapping from switch name to datapath id (only for app.py)
hosts: each host is a dictionary of attached switch, switch port and host IP address
low_hosts: array of low-capacity hosts, each as key in hosts dictionary
tees: transcoders, same format as hosts
